archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.5.8a: a) described content matching, which checks data against regular expressions, defined strings, keywords, patterns or dictionaries (a list of specific terms, keywords or key phrases)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
